name: Pixie Quest
description:
[Supports windows and run on windows edge]

This game was an entry to the Games Fleadh 2022 competition made in construct 3 with the prompt "Positive action in support of climate action".

 With the ability to spawn blocks as platforms navigate your way through 3 shorts levels picking up collectables scattered throughout the levels. Use your blocks to create platforms mid-air to go where you want to go while managing your resources used to create them.

Control Scheme: WASD to move, Left click to spawn a block, Right Click to despawn a block and regain 1 resource point used to make the block. Pressing E on a tree can regain 1 resource point.

General Story: You, a pixie sprite of the forest dedicated to managing and growing the forests have woken up to find your people missing having being caged by generic evil corporation™ to exploit their power for mass tree production and cutting, depriving the natural forests of their guardians. It is up to you to find them and bring them home.

All assets used in this game can be found credited in game along with a dedicated text file containing direct links to the assets used.
